title: Soot Lay Sanaeha
overview: Porphai is a young girl from upcountry who is skilled at making chicken stir-fried with basil, but suddenly, she is turned into a fictitious housewife for Anawat's household. The handsome young man, Anawat, wonders about Porphai's origin since she was not originally destined to meet him. Necessity leads both of them to be closer together, creating chaos with recipes and tricks. Over time, both of them fall in love with one another without realizing it...
